name: Merge Mania (Brian Mackenzie)
description:
Merge Mania is a high-score, time attack game made for ScoreSpace #14.  Move your mouse to move, and press space to merge into the lane above you!

Credits

Developed and designed by: Brian Mackenzie

Assets:

Cars: Kenny

Background: CraftPix

Woosh Sound: Lukas Eriksen

Music: Vicarelli Filippo

Crash Sound: VideoPlasty
